abstract: Carl C. Icahn, the billionaire financier who launched a proxy battle in May to replace the board of Yahoo in the wake of its failed deal to be acquired by Microsoft, said on Sunday the subsequent deal Yahoo forged with Google “might have some merit.”
lead_paragraph: Carl C. Icahn, the billionaire financier who launched a proxy battle in May to replace the board of Yahoo in the wake of its failed deal to be acquired by Microsoft, said on Sunday the subsequent deal Yahoo forged with Google “might have some merit.”

headline.main: Icahn Sees ‘Some Merit’ in Yahoo-Google Deal
